name: project-2-frontend
description: ## 📌 Overview **HealthMate** is a Healthcare Web Application where patients can:   - Scan their reports to analyze disease risks 🩺   - Detect vitamin/mineral deficiencies 🍎   - Get food & lifestyle recommendations 🥗   - Interact with an AI-powered chatbot 🤖   - Connect with doctors online 👨‍⚕️   - Give feedback and ratings ⭐
